class:
Priest
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 3%. Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 6%. Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 9%. Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 12%. Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 15%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 3%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 6%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 9%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 12%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 15%.
Gives you a 50% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage. Gives you a 100% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage.
Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 15%. Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 30%.
Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 5% and the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 8%. Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 10% and the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 16%. Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 15% and the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 24%. Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 20% and the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 32%. Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 25% and the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 40%.
When activated, reduces the Mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.
Increases your Spirit and Stamina by 2%. Increases your Spirit and Stamina by 4%. Increases your Spirit and Stamina by 6%. Increases your Spirit and Stamina by 8%. Increases your Spirit and Stamina by 10%.
Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 5%. Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 10%. Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 15%.
Your Inner Fire spell reduces critical damage taken from Physical attacks by 10%. Your Inner Fire spell reduces critical damage taken from Physical attacks by 20%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 1%. Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 2%. Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 3%.
Holy power infuses the target, increasing their Spirit by 17 for 30 min.
Gives your instant cast spells a 20% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 0.1 sec. Gives your instant cast spells a 40% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 0.2 sec. Gives your instant cast spells a 60% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 0.3 sec. Gives your instant cast spells a 80% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 0.4 sec. Gives your instant cast spells a 100% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.
Infuses the target with power, increasing their spell damage and healing by 20%. Lasts 15 sec.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 5%. Reduces all spell damage taken by 10%.
Gives your Smite and Holy Nova spells a 2% chance, and your Holy Fire spell a 4% chance, to disorient enemies for 2 sec. Gives your Smite and Holy Nova spells a 4% chance, and your Holy Fire spell a 8% chance, to disorient enemies for 2 sec. Gives your Smite and Holy Nova spells a 6% chance, and your Holy Fire spell a 12% chance, to disorient enemies for 2 sec. Gives your Smite and Holy Nova spells a 8% chance, and your Holy Fire spell a 16% chance, to disorient enemies for 2 sec. Gives your Smite and Holy Nova spells a 10% chance, and your Holy Fire spell a 20% chance, to disorient enemies for 2 sec.
Increases your target's armor by 8% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your healing spells or effects. Increases your target's armor by 16% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your healing spells or effects. Increases your target's armor by 25% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your healing spells or effects.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 2%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 3%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 4%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 5%.
After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 10% of the damage taken over 4 sec. In addition, increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 5%. After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 20% of the damage taken over 4 sec. In addition, increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 10%.
Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 29 to 34 Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing all party members within 10 yards for 54 to 63. These effects cause no threat.
Gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage, and reduces damage taken by 2%, while casting any healing spell. Gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage, and reduces damage taken by 4%, while casting any healing spell. Gives you a 60% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage, and reduces damage taken by 6%, while casting any healing spell. Gives you a 80% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage, and reduces damage taken by 8%, while casting any healing spell. Gives you a 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage, and reduces damage taken by 10%, while casting any healing spell.
Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 10%. Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 20%.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire and Greater Heal spells by 0.1 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire and Greater Heal spells by 0.2 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire and Greater Heal spells by 0.3 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire and Greater Heal spells by 0.4 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire and Greater Heal spells by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Prayer of Healing and Heal spells by 0.1 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Prayer of Healing and Heal spells by 0.2 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Prayer of Healing and Heal spells by 0.3 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Prayer of Healing and Heal spells by 0.4 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Prayer of Healing and Heal spells by 0.5 sec.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 5%. Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 10%.
Instantly heals the caster for 546 to 654.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Nova, Desperate Prayer, Prayer of Healing, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 5%. Reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Nova, Desperate Prayer, Prayer of Healing, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 10%.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 5% of your total Spirit. Increases spell damage and healing by up to 10% of your total Spirit. Increases spell damage and healing by up to 15% of your total Spirit. Increases spell damage and healing by up to 20% of your total Spirit. Increases spell damage and healing by up to 25% of your total Spirit.
Summons an Icon of Redemption with 600 health in front of the caster. Prevents a party member within 20 yds of the Icon of Redemption from dying, healing for 872 to 1033, when they take lethal damage. Lasts 1 minute.
Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 5% and increases the effect of your Fade ability by 5%. Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 10% and increases the effect of your Fade ability by 10%. Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 15% and increases the effect of your Fade ability by 15%. Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 20% and increases the effect of your Fade ability by 20%. Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 25% and increases the effect of your Fade ability by 25%.
Gives your Shadow damage spells a 2% chance to stun the target for 3 sec. Gives your Shadow damage spells a 4% chance to stun the target for 3 sec. Gives your Shadow damage spells a 6% chance to stun the target for 3 sec. Gives your Shadow damage spells a 8% chance to stun the target for 3 sec. Gives your Shadow damage spells a 10% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 2 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 4 sec.
Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 2%. Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 4%. Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 6%. Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 8%. Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 10%.
Increases the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 3 sec. Increases the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 6 sec. Increases the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 9 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 0.5 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 1 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 1.5 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 2 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 2.5 sec.
Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 6%. Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 13%. Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 20%.
Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 75 Shadow damage over 3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 50%.
Gives you a 2% chance, when your Shadow spells deal damage, to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit. For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting. Lasts 15 sec. Gives you a 4% chance, when your Shadow spells deal damage, to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit. For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting. Lasts 15 sec. Gives you a 6% chance, when your Shadow spells deal damage, to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit. For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting. Lasts 15 sec. Gives you a 8% chance, when your Shadow spells deal damage, to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit. For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting. Lasts 15 sec. Gives you a 10% chance, when your Shadow spells deal damage, to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit. For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting. Lasts 15 sec.
Gives your Mind Flay and Mind Blast spells a 25% chance reduce the Mana cost of your next Shadow spell by 20% but requiring you to sacrifice Health equal to 50% of the base cost of the spell. Gives your Mind Flay and Mind Blast spells a 25% chance reduce the Mana cost of your next Shadow spell by 40% but requiring you to sacrifice Health equal to 50% of the base cost of the spell. Gives your Mind Flay and Mind Blast spells a 25% chance reduce the Mana cost of your next Shadow spell by 60% but requiring you to sacrifice Health equal to 50% of the base cost of the spell.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 sec.
Afflicts your target with Shadow energy that causes all party members to be healed for 10% of any Shadow spell damage you deal for 1 min.
Increases the percentage healed by Vampiric Embrace by an additional 10%. Increases the percentage healed by Vampiric Embrace by an additional 20%.
Your Shadow damage spells have a 20% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage. This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times. Your Shadow damage spells have a 40% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage. This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times. Your Shadow damage spells have a 60% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage. This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times. Your Shadow damage spells have a 80% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage. This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times. Your Shadow damage spells have a 100% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage. This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases your Shadow spell damage by 2%. Increases your Shadow spell damage by 4%. Increases your Shadow spell damage by 6%. Increases your Shadow spell damage by 8%. Increases your Shadow spell damage by 10%.
Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 15% and reducing Physical damage done to you by 15%. However, you may not cast Holy spells while in this form.
